name: Plant Planets
description:
SUBMISSION FOR BTP GAME JAM 2

Sorry! No saving, sounds, or tutorial (you can figure it out on your own or read below). I had a late start due to midterms so I couldn't get everything I wanted in. Oh well, it was fun to make regardless!

Plant Planets is a casual relaxing game where you collect stardust from falling stars to find materials to plant your own mini planets!

Thanks for playing!

---TUTORIAL---

Falling stars will give you 1 star dust and 1 color. They have a chance to give you soil or water too.

You can add a max of 2 colors, if you add 3 it will just take the first 2.

Planets cost 1 soil with at least 1 color, 1 water with at least 1 color to plant.

Plants need to be fed 3-days with stardust (there are no days so just feed them three times by clicking on them lol)

Then your mini planet will sprout and you can click on it in the sky to see them up close!
